alert.note: Alert for Edmunds (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 9:59PM MDT until July 03 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Edmunds County in north central South Dakota... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1059 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ipswich, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ipswich around 1105 PM CDT. Pembrook Colony around 1110 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Cravens Corner, Mina and Mina Lake Rec Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
